attributes.additional_details: Alot of parents, including myself are angry at the thought of the kids summer holidays being taken away, and would refuse to send their kids in to school through the holiday. They have gone through a lot this past year. So they deserve to have their summer holidays and so do the teachers. Let them all keep their summer holidays.
attributes.background: Not to take away the summer holidays. The kids and teachers have worked really hard through this pandemic. It just is not fair that they get their summer holidays taken away from them.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the petition we currently have open on this topic:

Do not cut school holidays or extend the school day
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574585
